welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santiago de Cuba, a city known for its vibrant culture, music, and rich history. We invite you to explore its charming streets, beautiful architecture, and lively atmosphere. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that Santiago de Cuba has to offer!
